golden_comments.comment: queue.shutdown() may not exist in standard Python queue module
golden_comments.reason: queue.Queue.shutdown EXISTS in Python 3.13+ - this is not a bug in modern Python

golden_comments.comment: Magic number 50 for max_wait used repeatedly
golden_comments.reason: Style issue: Magic number 50 repeated multiple times - should be a named constant

golden_comments.comment: Test docstring doesn't match test implementation
golden_comments.reason: Documentation issue: Test docstring doesn't match implementation - senior engineer would flag
